/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a moment on a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a driver's view of the city's daily life. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a stark contrast to the urban landscape below. Buildings of various sizes and designs line the street, interspersed with trees that add a touch of green to the scene. Cars of different makes and models are scattered across the road, hinting at the city's vibrant transportation system. The sun shines brightly in the top left corner of the image, casting shadows and illuminating the scene with a warm glow. The image is a snapshot of urban life in Beijing, encapsulating the city's dynamic energy and architectural diversity.
